title: Standart room
description: A cozy and well-furnished room tailored for solo travelers. It features a comfortable single bed, a work desk for productivity, and a flat-screen TV for entertainment. The room is equipped with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and a private bathroom, making it an excellent choice for a short or business stay.

title: Double room
description: A thoughtfully designed room ideal for couples or two travelers. It includes a spacious double bed, a seating area, and a modern en-suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and a flat-screen TV. The room combines comfort and style, ensuring a restful and enjoyable stay.

title: Superior room
description: A larger and more refined option for small families or groups of friends. This room features a queen-size bed and an additional single bed, perfect for accommodating three guests comfortably. It offers upgraded furnishings, a mini-fridge, a coffee maker, and a modern bathroom with premium toiletries. A perfect choice for longer stays.

title: Deluxe room with ocean view
description: Experience luxury in this beautifully designed room with stunning ocean views. The room includes a king-size bed, a private balcony to soak in the scenery, and premium amenities such as a mini-bar, a coffee machine, and luxury bedding. The modern bathroom features a walk-in shower and high-end toiletries, making it an unforgettable stay.

title: Standart room with balcony
description: This cozy room offers the perfect blend of comfort and charm, featuring a single bed and a private balcony where guests can unwind and enjoy the fresh air. It also includes free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom, making it ideal for solo travelers seeking a relaxing experience.

title: Triple room
description: A spacious and practical option for families or groups, this room includes one queen-size bed and an additional single bed. Guests will appreciate the ample space, modern amenities like free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and a seating area. The room is designed for comfort and convenience, making it a great choice for extended stays.
